00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Stats
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034

00049 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051  SUBROUTINE Stats
00052 
00053 !  Common Variables
00054  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00055  USE Domain,      ONLY : invInitVol, invPi, iStep, tCall, xl, xu, yl, yu
00056  USE FluidParams, ONLY : bubbles, Convergence, eps, IntWidth, p, phi, sigma, u
00057  USE MPIParams,   ONLY : master, MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc
00058  USE MPI
00059  IMPLICIT NONE
00060 
00061 !  Local Variables
00062  INTEGER :: i, j
00063  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00064  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invVol, Pdif, Perr, Pin, Pout, R, Ro, Ref, Ux, Uy, Vef, Vol
00065  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:7) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00066 
00067 
00068 ! Initialize
00069  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00070  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00071  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00072 
00073 ! Loop through all nodes inside the drop for the current processor, vproc
00074  DO j = yl, yu
00075    DO i = xl, xu
00076 
00077      IF ( phi(i,j) >= 0.D0 ) THEN
00078        dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00079        dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + u(i,j,1)
00080        dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + u(i,j,2)
00081      END IF
00082 
00083      R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i) - bubbles(1,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j) - bubbles(1,2) )**2 )
00084      IF ( R < (Ro - IntWidth) ) THEN
00085        dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + p(i,j)
00086        dataLocal(5) = dataLocal(5) + 1.D0
00087      ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + IntWidth) ) THEN
00088        dataLocal(6) = dataLocal(6) + p(i,j)
00089        dataLocal(7) = dataLocal(7) + 1.D0
00090      END IF
00091 
00092    END DO
00093  END DO
00094 
00095 ! Gather global information
00096  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 7, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00097  Vol    = dataGlobal(1)
00098  invVol = 1.D0/Vol
00099 
00100 ! Save the initial volume during the first time step
00101  IF( iStep == 0 ) invInitVol = invVol
00102 
00103 ! Define average velocity of the drop and effective radius and volume
00104  Ux  = dataGlobal(2)*invVol
00105  Uy  = dataGlobal(3)*invVol
00106  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00107  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00108 
00109 ! Global value of the average pressure inside and outside the drop
00110  Pin  = dataGlobal(4)/dataGlobal(5)
00111  Pout = dataGlobal(6)/dataGlobal(7)
00112  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00113  Perr = (sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00114 
00115 ! Analyze convergence - Done over a certain period of time ( 10 x tStats ) to
00116 ! ensure that long range fluctuations do not give false positives
00117  Convergence(tCall) = Pdif
00118  IF ( MOD(tCall,11) == 0 ) THEN
00119    eps   = 0.D0
00120    tCall = 1
00121    DO i = 2, 11
00122      eps = eps + DABS( Convergence(i) - Convergence(i-1) )
00123    END DO
00124    eps = eps*0.1D0/Pdif
00125  ELSE
00126    tCall = tCall + 1
00127  END IF
00128 
00129 ! Save velocity and effective radius and volume data from the master node only
00130  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00131    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "stats.out", STATUS = "UNKNOWN", POSITION = "APPEND",&
00132         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00133    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00134      WRITE(10,'(I9,6ES19.9)')iStep,Ux,Uy,Vef,Ref,Pdif,Perr
00135      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00136    ELSE
00137      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00138      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00139      STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'stats.out'."
00140    END IF
00141  END IF
00142 
00143  RETURN
00144  END SUBROUTINE Stats
00145
